body_html:
I went through Tensorflow's code, and this is what they seem to have done:

  • Use cuBLAS for very large batch sizes with small matrices
  • Use cuSolver otherwise

I thought I'll leave this here, just in case.
body_text:

body:
I went through Tensorflow's code, and this is what they seem to have done:
- Use cuBLAS for very large batch sizes with small matrices
- Use cuSolver otherwise

I thought I'll leave this here, just in case.
